channel.title: Ramium Theme on Connor Shade
channel.description: Recent content in Ramium Theme on Connor Shade

item.title: Making a Vulnerable Webapp
item.description: I want to make a vulnerable webapp using Python FastAPI that I can scan with a custom projects/nmap probe and exploit with projects/metasploit module. The easiest would probably be command injection of a DNS tool Below is the process: Checkout a new git repo - I did this on github and cloned it locally. Start the Python dependencies Writing the App Python dependency management I use a virtual environment for everything I do with Python.

item.title: About Author
item.description: I like to work at the intersection of Security and Automation. I enjoy building content and training.

item.title: Intro Post
item.description: Welcome. This is my blog for the time being. Content Expect content to be: projects I work on, stuff I do, focused on tech. Hosting The address (connorshade.com) should never change, but the theme and hosting provider may. Right now I’m “hosting” on Github pages - posts are built with Hugo and I’m using the ramium theme. I expect the theme to change - probably to gruvbox when I want to deal with the npm stuff it requires.
